info.jeg.attachment_help_mdf: Crouch and press %s in-game for Attachments
info.jeg.fallback: Use this item in a crafting grid!
info.jeg.fallback_help: This is due to refactoring of items, sorry!
info.jeg.fallback_info: Item will be removed next update!
info.jeg.pocket_bubble: Give yourself some room to breathe!
info.jeg.tooltip_block_scrap_bin: Right-Click this block with Iron Items!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.gunmetal_ingot: Gunmetal is obtained by recycling Granite!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.gunmetal_grit: Gunmetal is obtained by smelting this!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.gunnite_ingot: Gunnite is obtained on the Gunmetal Workbench!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.repair_kit: Can repair guns if used on an Anvil!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.ectoplasm: Can be harvested with Boo Nests/Hives!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.water_bomb: Obtained by throwing a Grenade underwater!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.pocket_bubble: Right click Magma/Soul Sand Block with a Lead underwater!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.warden_blueprint: This Blueprint can be obtained by defeating The Warden!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.wither_blueprint: This Blueprint can be obtained by defeating The Wither!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.mk2_blueprint: This Blueprint can be traded with Piglins!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.ww_blueprint: This Blueprint can be obtained by Fishing!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.compound_bow_bluep: This Blueprint is dropped by the Faction The Rattlers in Raids!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.light_machine_gun_: This Blueprint is dropped by the Faction Nosy Business in Raids!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.grenade_launcher_b: This Blueprint is dropped by the Faction Night Of The Undead in Raids!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.flamethrower_bluep: This Blueprint is dropped by the Faction Hell Hogs in Raids!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.tech_trash: Obtained in the Scrap Bin, by Mining or by Recycling!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.scrap: Obtained in the Scrap Bin, by Mining or by Recycling!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.brimstone_crystal: Can be found in Badlands and Basalt Deltas!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.raw_brimstone: Can be found in Badlands and Basalt Deltas!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.firearm_blueprint: Can be used to obtain a Firearm's crafting recipe!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.firearm_blueprint_: Write a Blueprint on the Schematic Station!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.soul_treat: Can be fed to Bees to transform them into Boos!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.soul_treat.obtainm: Can be obtained with a Cookie and a Soul Campfire!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.blaze_round: Right Click a Blaze with Rifle Ammo to obtain!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.trumpet: That Skeleton never hurt you. Remember that.
info.jeg.tooltip_item.flashlight_help: Charge it by shaking it aggressively!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.flashlight_help_gu: If attached to a gun, press %s to switch it ON/OFF!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.treasure_bag: Right Click to receive a surprise!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.classic_paint_job_: JEG would have never been possible without Mr. Crayfish!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.paint_job_can: Can be applied to guns to change the skin!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.paint_job_can.disc: Not all guns have Paint Jobs!
info.jeg.tooltip_item.kill_effect: Can be applied to guns to add a Headshot effect!
info.jeg.hold_fire: HOLD the FIRE button to use it!
info.jeg.echo_shard: Killing any Entity with this gun has a chance to spawn Echo Shards!
info.jeg.infinity: This firearm has slain a Dragon
info.jeg.raid_flare: This Flare will start a Raid!
broadcast.jeg.info.gunner_mobs: Beware! Gunner Mobs from JEG are enabled in the Config!
broadcast.jeg.info.raids: Beware! Faction Raids from JEG are enabled in the Config!
broadcast.jeg.info.explosive_mobs: Beware! Explosive Mobs from JEG are enabled in the Config!
broadcast.jeg.info.warning: It is highly recommended to modify your Config files from Just Enough Guns! Mobs with Guns, Gunner Mobs Patrols, Raids and Explosive Mobs could be enabled!
broadcast.jeg.info.disable_messages: These messages can be disabled in Config!
broadcast.jeg.infinity: The End has been freed. Firearms have been blessed.
broadcast.jeg.withered: The Darkness has been vanquished. Firearms are now stronger.
broadcast.jeg.terror_phantom_defeat: The skies echo with the sound of a dozen wings swooping. The Phantom Swarm has been released.
broadcast.jeg.raid: The Faction %s has started a raid at %s!
broadcast.jeg.raid.next_wave: Good job on beating the wave! The enemies are preparing to attack again!
broadcast.jeg.raid.no_players: There are no players left in the Raid zone!
broadcast.jeg.raid.defeat: The Faction %s has won the Raid!
broadcast.jeg.raid.peaceful: Raids, can't be started on Peaceful, dummy.
broadcast.jeg.terror_armada.victory: The swooping of a giant beast echoes in the sky...
chat.jeg.disabled_flashlights: Flashlights are disabled on this server!
chat.jeg.flashlight_battery_dead: Spam Left-Click to charge the Flashlight!
chat.jeg.rocket_ride: You have to crouch to Rocket Ride entities!
chat.jeg.flamethrower: You have to be crouching to light blocks on fire!
chat.jeg.raid_flare_loaded: You just loaded a Raid Flare!
slot.jeg.blueprint.blueprint_help: Here goes the Gun/Blueprint to copy!
slot.jeg.blueprint.blank_help: Here goes Firearm Blueprint Item to overwrite!
slot.jeg.toggle_medals.disabled: Medals are disabled on this server
enchantment.jeg.quick_hands.desc: Increases the speed of reloading weapons
enchantment.jeg.trigger_finger.desc: Increases the speed you can fire weapons
enchantment.jeg.lightweight.desc: Reduces the weight of a weapon to increase ADS speed
enchantment.jeg.collateral.desc: Makes fired bullets travel through multiple entities
enchantment.jeg.over_capacity.desc: Increases the ammo capacity of a weapon
enchantment.jeg.reclaimed.desc: Creates a chance that a bullet won't be consumed upon firing a weapon
enchantment.jeg.accelerator.desc: Increases the speed of fired projectiles causing them to do more damage
enchantment.jeg.puncturing.desc: Creates a chance that a bullet will deal critical damage
enchantment.jeg.fire_starter.desc: Fired bullets will set blocks and entities on fire upon impact
enchantment.jeg.infinity.desc: This weapon no longer needs ammo to reload
enchantment.jeg.withered.desc: Increases the damage of a weapon
perk.jeg.title: Perks:
perk.jeg.laser_pointer.positive: Entity In Crosshair Highlighted While ADS
